items.desc: Enhanced the Home page (index.html) with a 'Quick Stats' section highlighting the number of towers, flats, occupied units, and annual events for better visitor insights.
Updated governing-body.html with a colorful, visually appealing layout and added an email link to the Secretary portfolio for quick queries.
Added alternating row colors and hover highlights to the Quarterly Expense Report table for better readability and visual clarity.
Introduced slightly stronger alternate row shading to improve table legibility without being distracting.
Added Income and Expenditure filter checkboxes above the table; selecting/deselecting them dynamically updates the table and corresponding charts.
Added Quarterly Expense Report page with interactive charts, budget gauge, and table view for Q2 2025.
Enhanced the page with a light gradient background and responsive layout for better readability and mobile experience.
Included contextual note highlighting increased costs due to special festivals and urgent maintenance, displayed only for relevant quarters.
Added countdown to Kali Puja on the Home page (index.html) to help visitors track the upcoming festival.
Introduced diwali.html page, which will be automatically displayed on 20th Oct 2025 to celebrate Diwali.
Updated governing-body.html to reflect selected EC members during the AGM held on 27th July 2025.
Added a dedicated Virtual Darshan section on darshan.html for an enhanced spiritual experience.
Introduced Durga Puja Nirghanta section, providing detailed and accessible event information.
